An unofficial **[Waifu.pics](https://waifu.pics)** API wrapper for Python

## ğŸ“¦ Packages

### ğŸ PyPI

```sh
pip install nahida
```

## ğŸ” Examples

```py
import nahida

client = nahida.Client()

print(client.nsfw.search("neko"))

print(client.sfw.search("awoo"))
print(client.sfw.search("bite"))
```
